    Methods

    AddEventInstance(IRegistryEvent)

    Try to add a new event to the registry.

    If registry already contain an identical event instance, the method :

    1. returns a reference to the instance stored int the registry.

    If the registry does not contains an identical event instance, the method :

    1. adds the event instance to the registry
    2. calls OnNewElementRegistered()
    3. returns a reference to the stored instance.

    Declaration
    public RegistryEventReference AddEventInstance(IRegistryEvent effect)
    Parameters
    Type Name Description
    IRegistryEvent effect
    Returns
    Type Description
    RegistryEventReference

    GetRegisteredEffects<EVENT_TYPE>(ref NativeHashMap<Int32, EVENT_TYPE>)

    Extract a copy of all event of a given type referenced by VersionId. Caching the result is advised.

    Declaration
    public void GetRegisteredEffects<EVENT_TYPE>(ref NativeHashMap<int, EVENT_TYPE> registeredEvents)
    where EVENT_TYPE : struct, IRegistryEvent
    Parameters
    Type Name Description
    NativeHashMap<Int32, EVENT_TYPE> registeredEvents

    The NativeHashmap to copy the effects to.
    Type Parameters
    Name Description
    EVENT_TYPE

    The type of event to extract.

    OnNewElementRegistered()

    Raise a C# event. This should be called by AddEventInstance(IRegistryEvent) whenever a new event instance is added to the registry.

    Declaration
    public void OnNewElementRegistered()

    SubscribeToElementRegisteredEvent(EventHandler)

    Add a method to invoke when OnNewElementRegistered() raise a C# event.

    Declaration
    public void SubscribeToElementRegisteredEvent(EventHandler method)
    Parameters
    Type Name Description
    EventHandler method

    The method to register for invokation when an event instance is added to the registry.

    UnsubscribeToElementRegisteredEvent(EventHandler)

    Remove a method from the list of invoked method when OnNewElementRegistered() raise a C# event.

    Declaration
    public void UnsubscribeToElementRegisteredEvent(EventHandler method)
    Parameters
    Type Name Description
    EventHandler method

    The method to deregister for invokation when an event instance is added to the registry.
